description: Defines a Flask route for health checking, utilizing Flask and flask_smorest Blueprints, providing a simple endpoint that returns a health status message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask MethodView class providing a GET endpoint for health status.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check route, returning a JSON indicating health status.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
